sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with suo hou zhang 鎖喉瘴 , throat-locking miasma. Pu ji fang 普濟方 61: 治 鎖喉瘴，又名朴蛇瘴，項大腫痛連喉 , “To cure throat-locking miasma, which is also called ‘ cobra snake miasma ’. The [patient’s] nape is massively swollen and painful, and this also affects the throat”. Pin guan duo tai 頻慣墮胎 , repeated miscarriage [1]

Pathological Condition identical with shu duo tai 數墮胎 , frequent miscarriage. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry du zhong 杜仲 quotes Jian bian dan fang 簡便單方 : 頻慣墮胎：或三四月即墜者 , “ Repeated miscarriage : [Patients experience] a spontaneous abortion in the third or fourth month [of pregnancy]”.
